content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Ore Mine at position(x=-17.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities:
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-17.0, y=-50.0) and a transport belt at position(x=-16.5, y=-51.5)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a transport belt at position(x=-14.5, y=-51.5)
-  Burner inserter (position x=-13.5, y=-50.5) and a wooden chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-48.5)
-  Burner inserter (position x=-13.5, y=-48.5) and a wooden chest at position(x=-13.5, y=-49.5)

### Furnace at position(x=-10.0, y=-49.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=-10.0, y=-49.0) with no fuel and no output

### Belt Group at position(x=-17.5, y=-51.5)
Consists of a belt group with inputs from position(x=-17.5, y=-51.5) to position(x=-15.5, y=-51.5) and outputs from position(x=-14.5, y=-51.5) to position(x=-12.5, y=-51.5)

### Belt Group at position(x=-14.5, y=-47.5)
Consists of a belt group with inputs from position(x=-14.5, y=-47.5) to position(x=-12.5, y=-47.5) and outputs from position(x=-12.5, y=-47.5) to position(x=-12.5, y=-49.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when trying to get coal resource patch
-  Make sure to check if the coal resource is available at the specified location before trying to get it
### Errors when trying to insert coal into furnace
-  Ensure you have coal in your inventory before trying to insert it into the furnace
### Errors when drill is out of fuel
-  Make sure to insert coal into the drill to keep it fueled
### Errors when inserter is waiting for source items
-  Ensure that the inserter has a source of items to pick up before trying to insert items into another entity
### Errors when trying to insert iron ore into inserter
-  Make sure that the inserter is configured to accept iron ore and that there is a nearby entity that can accept the iron ore

# NAMESPACE
*  `get_resource_patch`: a function to get a resource patch, returns an error if the resource is not available at the specified location
*  `insert_item`: a function to insert an item into an entity, returns an error if the item is not available in the inventory or if the entity cannot accept the item
*  `burner-mining-drill`: an entity that mines resources, requires fuel to operate
*  `stone-furnace`: an entity that smelts resources, requires fuel to operate
*  `burner-inserter`: an entity that inserts items into other entities, requires fuel to operate
*  `wooden-chest`: an entity that stores items
*  `transport-belt`: an entity that transports items
*  `BeltGroup`: an entity that consists of multiple belts, transports items from inputs to outputs
*  Important variables:
  + `coal`: a resource that is used as fuel for drills and furnaces
  + `iron-ore`: a resource that is mined and smelted into iron plates
  + `iron-plate`: a resource that is produced by smelting iron ore
  + `transport-belt`: an entity that transports items
  + `burner-mining-drill`: an entity that mines resources, requires fuel to operate
  + `stone-furnace`: an entity that smelts resources, requires fuel to operate
  + `burner-inserter`: an entity that inserts items into other entities, requires fuel to operate
  + `wooden-chest`: an entity that stores items
  + `BeltGroup`: an entity that consists of multiple belts, transports items from inputs to outputs
